item.title: ChiBot
item.description: ChiBot is an initiative by my friends to develop a chat-bot which acts like me. ChiBots are neither developed by me nor maintained by me. After all, they are fun to play with. ChiBot API https://blog.zhuangty.com/api/chi_corpus returns a JSON for that. ChiBot on Telegram Type @realskyzh_bot and a space in chatbox to interact with ChiBot.
